lefthandWords.words: If they offered me the job|If the water was warmer|What would Marilyn say|I would call her|We would love to see you|If you asked me for an answer|If you took those books out

righthandWords.words: I would take it.|we could swim in it.|if she knew you were here?|if I could remember her number.|if you had time to visit.|I wouldn't know what to say.|your bag wouldn't be so heavy.
